Uses of Package
io.janusproject.services.network

  • Packages that use io.janusproject.services.network 
    Package Description
    io.janusproject.kernel.services.gson
    Implementation of services based on Gson.
    io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.network
    Implementation of the network services based on the Java Development Kit.
    io.janusproject.kernel.services.zeromq
    Implementation of services based on ZeroMQ.
    io.janusproject.kernel.space
    Classes and tools for implementing spaces in the Janus platform.
    io.janusproject.services.network  
  • Classes in io.janusproject.services.network used by io.janusproject.kernel.services.gson 
    Class and Description
    AbstractEventSerializer
    Abstract implementation of an event serializer.
    EventDispatch
    Description of the required information for dispatching an event over the network.
    EventEncrypter
    An encrypter of events to be published over the network.
    EventEnvelope
    Envelope of a message that is exchanged other the network.
    EventSerializer
    A serializer of events to be published over the network.
